attributes.action: Ban halal and kosher slaughter methods in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: We are being driven into accepting these barbaric processes without consent, to keep a minority population satisfied.
attributes.background: To make slaughter without stunning illegal

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban the non-stun slaughter of animals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729708
